title: As Heat Waves Intensify, Paris Plans for Record Temperatures
summary: City planners say the day when temperatures as high as 122 degrees Fahrenheit, or 50 Celsius, could stall the French capital is not far off. They are already starting to prepare.

summary: The tradition of the siesta is no accident. Spain has been living with extreme heat for centuries, and its people have ways of coping.
